00083 enum L4_vcon_write_consts
00084 {
00086   L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE = (L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 2) * sizeof(l4_umword_t),

00115 typedef struct l4_vcon_attr_t
00116 {

00118   l4_umword_t o_flags; 
00119   l4_umword_t l_flags; 
00120 } l4_vcon_attr_t;

00130   L4_VCON_ICRNL  = 000400,

00197 enum L4_vcon_ops
00198 {
00199   L4_VCON_WRITE_OP       = 0UL,    
00200   L4_VCON_SET_ATTR_OP    = 2UL,    
00201   L4_VCON_GET_ATTR_OP    = 3UL,    
00202 };
00203 
00204 /******* Implementations ********************/
00205 
00206 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00207 l4_vcon_send_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00208 {
00209   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00210   mr->mr[0] = L4_VCON_WRITE_OP;
00211   mr->mr[1] = size;
00212   __builtin_memcpy(&mr->mr[2], buf, size);
00213   return l4_ipc_send(vcon, utcb,
00214                      l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG,
00215                                2 + (size + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00216                                0, L4_MSGTAG_SCHEDULE),
00217                                L4_IPC_NEVER);
00218 }
00219 
00220 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00221 l4_vcon_send(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size) L4_NOTHROW
00222 {
00223   return l4_vcon_send_u(vcon, buf, size, l4_utcb());
00224 }
00225 
00226 L4_INLINE long
00227 l4_vcon_write_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00228 {
00229   l4_msgtag_t t;
00230 
00231   if (size > L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE)
00232     size = L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE;
00233 
00234   t = l4_vcon_send_u(vcon, buf, size, utcb);
00235   if (l4_msgtag_has_error(t))
00236     return l4_error(t);
00237 
00238   return size;
00239 }
00240 
00241 L4_INLINE long
00242 l4_vcon_write(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char const *buf, int size) L4_NOTHROW
00243 {
00244   return l4_vcon_write_u(vcon, buf, size, l4_utcb());
00245 }
00246 
00247 L4_INLINE int
00248 l4_vcon_read_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00249 {
00250   int ret, r;
00251   l4_msg_regs_t *mr;
00252 
00253   if (size <= 0)
00254     return -L4_EINVAL;
00255 
00256   mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00257   mr->mr[0] = size << 16;
00258 
00259   ret = l4_error_u(l4_ipc_call(vcon, utcb,
00260                                l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG, 1, 0, 0),
00261                                L4_IPC_NEVER), utcb);
00262   if (ret < 0)
00263     return ret;
00264 
00265   r = mr->mr[0] & ~(1U << 31);
00266 
00267   if (!(mr->mr[0] & (1UL << 31))) // !eof
00268     ret = size + 1;
00269   else if (r < size)
00270     ret = r;
00271   else
00272     ret = size;
00273 
00274   __builtin_memcpy(buf, &mr->mr[1], r);
00275   return ret;
00276 }
00277 
00278 L4_INLINE int
00279 l4_vcon_read(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, char *buf, int size) L4_NOTHROW
00280 {
00281   return l4_vcon_read_u(vcon, buf, size, l4_utcb());
00282 }
00283 
00284 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00285 l4_vcon_set_attr_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t const *attr,
00286                    l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00287 {
00288   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00289 
00290   mr->mr[0] = L4_VCON_SET_ATTR_OP;
00291   __builtin_memcpy(&mr->mr[1], attr, sizeof(*attr));
00292 
00293   return l4_ipc_call(vcon, utcb,
00294                      l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG, 4, 0, 0),
00295                      L4_IPC_NEVER);
00296 }
00297 
00298 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00299 l4_vcon_set_attr(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t const *attr) L4_NOTHROW
00300 {
00301   return l4_vcon_set_attr_u(vcon, attr, l4_utcb());
00302 }
00303 
00304 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00305 l4_vcon_get_attr_u(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t *attr,
00306                    l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00307 {
00308   l4_msgtag_t res;
00309   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00310 
00311   mr->mr[0] = L4_VCON_GET_ATTR_OP;
00312 
00313   res = l4_ipc_call(vcon, utcb,
00314                     l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_LOG, 1, 0, 0),
00315                     L4_IPC_NEVER);
00316   if (l4_error_u(res, utcb) >= 0)
00317     __builtin_memcpy(attr, &mr->mr[1], sizeof(*attr));
00318 
00319   return res;
00320 }
00321 
00322 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00323 l4_vcon_get_attr(l4_cap_idx_t vcon, l4_vcon_attr_t *attr) L4_NOTHROW
00324 {
00325   return l4_vcon_get_attr_u(vcon, attr, l4_utcb());
00326 }
